description: Least number coprime to n, n+1 and n+2.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a[n_] := (k = 5; While[! (CoprimeQ[k, n] && CoprimeQ[k, n+1] && CoprimeQ[k, n+2]), k++]; k); Table[a[n], {n, 1, 92}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Nov 30 2011 *)lnc[n_]:=Module[{k=5,c=n+{0,1,2}},While[!And@@CoprimeQ[k,c],k=k+2];k]; Array[lnc,100] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 01 2015 *)
prog: (Haskell)a053671 n = f $ drop 2 a000040_list where   f (p:ps) | (n `mod` p) * ((n+1) `mod` p) * ((n+2) `mod` p) > 0 = p            | otherwise = f ps-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 19 2011
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Feb 15 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Feb 22 2000
